attributes.action: Exempt Raod Tax for Mountain Rescue Team Vehicles
attributes.additional_details: I think it's about time the Goverment asked the DVLA to exempt Road Tax on All Mountain Rescue Team Vehicles. The DVLA approach was they could register them as Ambulances....but looking at the rules not all can be Ambulances as it reads: Ambulance is defined as having a sole use of carrying patients.
